abstract: The institutional brokerage firm Liquidnet has hired Lou Kerner, a veteran Internet analyst, to head a new trading platform for private company shares.
snippet: The institutional brokerage firm Liquidnet has hired Lou Kerner, a veteran Internet analyst, to head a new trading platform for private company shares.
lead_paragraph: The institutional brokerage firm Liquidnet has hired Lou Kerner, a veteran Internet analyst, to head a new trading platform for private company shares, the company announced on Monday.

headline.main: Liquidnet Hires Lou Kerner to Head Private Shares Platform
